title: Looking to trade 1910 Sepia Christy Mathewson
author: Cards2121

posts.post_title: Looking to trade 1910 Sepia Christy Mathewson
posts.post_content: Hi guys I’m looking to trade my 1910 Sepia SGC 40 (3) Christy Mathewson (pop 13) for a Ty Cobb item. Ideally would love a low grade grade Sepia Cobb/Wagner but would consider any Cobb postcard or T206 Cobb. Message me with any questions, thanks!
